roleset.name: corrupt, impair, invalidate
roleset.note: VITIATE-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. (from vitiate.01-v)

example.name: run-on sentences R us (except not anymore)
example.text: That is, in requesting the TRO, [the government]-6 will not seek [*-6]to vitiate legitimate business transactions occurring between the defendant and third parties.
example.arg: legitimate business transactions occurring between the defendant and third parties
